CustomField.description: Visualization of confidence in Opportunities. Populates based on "Opportunity Win Confidence" metric.
CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity_Win_Confidence__c >= 0.7, IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000ZQaq", "Green Icon",30,30), IF( Opportunity_Win_Confidence__c >= 0.5, IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000ZQav", "Yellow Icon",30,30), IF( Opportunity_Win_Confidence__c < 0.5, IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000ZQb0", "Red Icon",30,30), IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000ZQbF", "Unknown",30,30) )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Visualization of confidence in Opportunities. Populates based on "Opportunity Win Confidence" metric.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Confidence
